thread.title: Kurt Busch Signs Extension with Stewart-Haas Racing
thread.title_full: Kurt Busch Signs Extension with Stewart-Haas Racing

author: Jeanette Torres
title: Kurt Busch Signs Extension with Stewart-Haas Racing
text:
Share Article 
Jared C. Tilton/Stewart-Haas Racing via Getty Images (NEW YORK) -- Kurt Busch is extending his relationship with Stewart-Haas Racing.The organization on Wednesday announced that Busch, 37, has signed a multi-year contract with SHR that will kick in next season. As part of the new deal, Monster Energy will serve as a co-sponsor of his No. 41 Chevrolet SS with Haas Automation.“I’m very happy to be back with Stewart-Haas Racing and proud to take Monster Energy to the Sprint Cup Series,” Busch said in a statement. “This is exactly where I want to be and I have two partners who want to win as much as I do.”Busch, who is currently third in the Chase standings, has been with SHR since 2014.
